title: Result if average speed of gas molecules increases

content.question: Which of the following will occur if the average speed of the gas molecules in a closed rigid container is increased?

choices.label: The density of the gas will decrease.
The density of the gas will increase.
The pressure of the gas will increase.
The pressure of the gas will decrease.
The temperature of the gas will decrease.

content.answer: The pressure of the gas will increase.

topic.text: 9.1: Kinetic Theory of Temperature and Pressure

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
